nodes.text: Destruction of the Toledian main city

Around 34 ABY, the main city of the Mid Rim planet Toledian was destroyed in a mining accident. News of the cities destruction reached the planet Batuu, where it was discussed by residents of Black Spire Outpost. Julen Rakab overheard that chaos rose on Toledian after the accident while he was with Izal Garsea at Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo.
The destruction of the Toledian main city was first mentioned in the 2019 novel A Crash of Fate, written by Zoraida Córdova.
